title: How to Get Credits in Topps KICK 15

steps.headline: Launch KICK.
steps.description: Locate the app on your device. The app icon has pictures of different football players. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Claim Daily Reward.
steps.description: A pop-up window will appear indicating your Daily Rewards of 1,000 coins. Tap the “OK” button on the pop-up to get your credits.

steps.headline: View total credits.
steps.description: Tap the shopping cart icon on the bottom toolbar, and you will be brought to the app’s Store. Your total credits will be displayed on the top left corner.

steps.headline: Come back daily.
steps.description: Free credits of 1,000 coins are given to you every day as long as you open the app. So come back daily and get your free credits to use in buying card packs.

steps.headline: Launch KICK.
steps.description: Locate the app on your device. The app icon has pictures of different football players. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Go to the Store.
steps.description: The Store is the app’s store. Tap on the shopping cart icon on the bottom toolbar to access it. The Store is where you can see the available card packs for purchase.

steps.headline: Tap the Coins menu from the left panel to see all the Coin Bundles available.
steps.description: You can buy different amounts of coins, from as little as 3,000 coins at $0.99 to as much as 900,000 coins at $89.99.

steps.headline: Buy a coin bundle.
steps.description: From the list of available bundles, select the one you’d like to buy, and then tap on the price button beside the bundle.

steps.headline: Sign into the iTunes Store.
steps.description: You will be prompted to sign in with your Apple ID since your purchase will be processed within iTunes Store. Type your ID and password into the fields provided then tap “OK” to proceed.

steps.headline: View your total credits.
steps.description: iTunes Store will validate and process your purchase. Once done, you will receive your purchased credits in coins, which will be displayed on the top left corner.

text: Claiming the Daily Free Credits Launch KICK. Locate the app on your device. The app icon has pictures of different football players. Tap on it. Claim Daily Reward. A pop-up window will appear indicating your Daily Rewards of 1,000 coins. Tap the “OK” button on the pop-up to get your credits. View total credits. Tap the shopping cart icon on the bottom toolbar, and you will be brought to the app’s Store. Your total credits will be displayed on the top left corner. Come back daily. Free credits of 1,000 coins are given to you every day as long as you open the app. So come back daily and get your free credits to use in buying card packs. Buying More Credits Launch KICK. Locate the app on your device. The app icon has pictures of different football players. Tap on it. Go to the Store. The Store is the app’s store. Tap on the shopping cart icon on the bottom toolbar to access it. The Store is where you can see the available card packs for purchase. Tap the Coins menu from the left panel to see all the Coin Bundles available. You can buy different amounts of coins, from as little as 3,000 coins at $0.99 to as much as 900,000 coins at $89.99. Buy a coin bundle. From the list of available bundles, select the one you’d like to buy, and then tap on the price button beside the bundle. Sign into the iTunes Store. You will be prompted to sign in with your Apple ID since your purchase will be processed within iTunes Store. Type your ID and password into the fields provided then tap “OK” to proceed. View your total credits. iTunes Store will validate and process your purchase. Once done, you will receive your purchased credits in coins, which will be displayed on the top left corner.
